actors.name: United States of America
actors.description: Global superpower with unmatched military capabilities, largest economy by GDP, dominant financial system (USD), technological leadership, and extensive diplomatic influence across all continents. Controls key international institutions and maintains significant cultural soft power.

parameters.name: Nominal GDP
parameters.description: Total annual Gross Domestic Product in current US dollars.

parameters.name: Military Budget
parameters.description: Annual defense spending including all military branches and operations.

parameters.name: Total Population
parameters.description: Current total number of residents and citizens.

parameters.name: Nuclear Warhead Count
parameters.description: Total number of operational nuclear weapons in arsenal.

parameters.name: UN Security Council Veto Power
parameters.description: Permanent member status with veto power in UN Security Council.

parameters.name: Global Reserve Currency Share
parameters.description: Percentage of global foreign exchange reserves held in USD.

parameters.name: Diplomatic Mission Count
parameters.description: Number of embassies, consulates, and diplomatic offices worldwide.

parameters.name: Tech Companies Market Cap
parameters.description: Combined market capitalization of top tech companies.

parameters.name: Higher Education Ranking
parameters.description: Global ranking in higher education system quality and research output.

parameters.name: Aircraft Carrier Count
parameters.description: Number of operational aircraft carriers in naval fleet.

parameters.name: NATO Defense Contribution
parameters.description: Percentage of total NATO defense spending.

parameters.name: Annual Patents Filed
parameters.description: Number of patents filed annually within the country.

parameters.name: International Trade Volume
parameters.description: Total annual import and export value.

parameters.name: Foreign Aid Budget
parameters.description: Annual foreign assistance and development aid spending.

parameters.name: GDP per Capita
parameters.description: Average GDP per person in current US dollars.

parameters.name: Internet Penetration Rate
parameters.description: Percentage of population with internet access.

parameters.name: R&D Spending
parameters.description: Annual research and development expenditure as percentage of GDP.

parameters.name: Soft Power Index
parameters.description: Measure of non-coercive international influence through culture, values, and policies.

parameters.name: Active Military Personnel
parameters.description: Total number of active duty military personnel.

parameters.name: Debt to GDP Ratio
parameters.description: National debt as a percentage of GDP.

actors.name: People's Republic of China
actors.description: Second largest economy, rising military power, largest population, dominant manufacturing base, growing technological capabilities, massive infrastructure investments (Belt and Road), and increasing diplomatic influence, especially in developing nations.

parameters.name: GDP (Nominal)
parameters.description: Total annual Gross Domestic Product in current USD.

parameters.name: Total Population
parameters.description: Total number of permanent residents in the country.

parameters.name: Military Expenditure
parameters.description: Annual defense budget and military-related spending.

parameters.name: Manufacturing Output
parameters.description: Annual total manufacturing production value.

parameters.name: Foreign Exchange Reserves
parameters.description: Total value of foreign currency reserves held by central bank.

parameters.name: Belt and Road Investment
parameters.description: Cumulative investment in Belt and Road Initiative projects.

parameters.name: R&D Spending
parameters.description: Annual spending on research and development across all sectors.

parameters.name: Urbanization Rate
parameters.description: Percentage of population living in urban areas.

parameters.name: Energy Consumption
parameters.description: Total annual energy consumption in million tonnes of oil equivalent.

parameters.name: Export Value
parameters.description: Total annual value of exports.

parameters.name: Technology Patents
parameters.description: Number of technology patents filed annually.

parameters.name: Diplomatic Missions
parameters.description: Number of diplomatic missions and consulates worldwide.

parameters.name: Internet Users
parameters.description: Number of active internet users in the country.

parameters.name: CO2 Emissions
parameters.description: Annual carbon dioxide emissions in metric tons.

parameters.name: High-Speed Rail Network
parameters.description: Total length of high-speed rail network in kilometers.

parameters.name: Universities
parameters.description: Number of higher education institutions.

parameters.name: Active Military Personnel
parameters.description: Number of active duty military personnel.

parameters.name: Major Trade Partners
parameters.description: Number of countries with significant bilateral trade relationships.

parameters.name: Debt to GDP Ratio
parameters.description: Total government debt as percentage of GDP.

parameters.name: Soft Power Index
parameters.description: Composite score measuring cultural, diplomatic, and economic influence globally.
